trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that classes implement to provide navigation user interface data and values to navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供類別實作的介面，以提供巡覽使用者介面資料和值給巡覽控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData> interface allows navigation controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controls, to automatically render data from a data source that represents hierarchical site navigation data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData>介面允許導覽控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項，來自動呈現代表階層式導覽資料的資料來源的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData> interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> type that is returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control so that navigation controls can render data automatically without a page developer explicitly defining the data binding associations to the properties of <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData>介面由實作<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>從傳回的型別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項，以便瀏覽控制項可以自動轉譯資料，而不需明確定義資料繫結關聯的網頁開發人員屬性的<xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control enables declarative data binding so that a page developer does not have to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties explicitly for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controls, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控制項可讓宣告式資料繫結，讓網頁開發人員不需要填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性明確<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>分別控制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData> interface can also be implemented on objects that are returned by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in order to enable automatic rendering of navigation control without explicit data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData>也可以在所傳回的物件上實作介面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>才能啟用自動呈現沒有明確的資料繫結導覽控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that represents the description of a navigation node of a navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字，表示巡覽控制項之巡覽節點的描述。

trans-unit.source: Text that is the description of a node of a navigation control; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽控制項之節點的描述文字，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Description%2A> property is rendered as the ToolTip text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Description%2A>屬性會呈現為工具提示文字的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text that represents the name of a navigation node of a navigation control.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字，表示巡覽控制項之巡覽節點的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Text that represents the name of a node of a navigation control; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽控制項之節點名稱的文字，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Name%2A> property is rendered as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Name%2A>屬性呈現為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL to navigate to when the navigation node is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得當按一下巡覽節點時所要巡覽至的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to navigate to when the node is clicked; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在按一下節點時所要巡覽至的 URL，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.NavigateUrl%2A> property represents the URL to navigate to when a navigation node, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control, is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性代表 URL 時瀏覽節點中，瀏覽到這類<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>控制，請按下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a non-displayed value that is used to store any additional data about the navigation node.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來儲存巡覽節點的任何額外資料之隱藏值。

trans-unit.source: A value that is not displayed and is used to store additional data about the navigation node; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來儲存巡覽節點的額外資料之隱藏值，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Value%2A> property represents any additional data that is used by a navigation node, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control, that is rendered as an HTML `value` attribute for the node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Value%2A>屬性表示由瀏覽節點，例如任何其他資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>控制項轉譯為 HTML`value`節點的屬性。
